skillTree.name: Blood Chalice of Bathori
skillTree.description: The life essence of many wretched, innocent smallfolk ensures that those who drink from this cursed cup thrive with newfound power.

skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

skillTree.name: Hellsteed
skillTree.description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Vampires
skillTree.description: This one is no apprentice in the black arts but a master of Necromancy and Dark Magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Midnight's Children
skillTree.description: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

effects.description: Leadership: +8 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
Melee Attack: +8 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units

skillTree.name: At Dawn They Sleep
skillTree.description: Nocturnal spectres hiding from the light, addicted to your blood.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
Passive ability: "The Hunger" for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units

skillTree.name: Court of Blood
skillTree.description: Even in Undeath, every queen needs loyal retainers and handmaidens.

skillTree.name: The Ravening Beast
skillTree.description: The darkness within us all, given free rein to lust and gorge eternally.

skillTree.name: Storm of the Night
skillTree.description: "Come, my night-shape servants, we have a great work ahead of us."

skillTree.name: Time of Arising
skillTree.description: “Rise, my friends, rise. Flesh and blood has its place, but spirit is the prize valued above all other.”

effects.description: Speed: +30% for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
Passive ability: "Wayfarer" for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Dark Knight
skillTree.description: "See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaze of Nagash"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee attack: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
Melee defence: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description: Speed: +6% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Speed: +9% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Charge bonus: +6 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Speed: +12% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units

skillTree.name: Evil Souls
skillTree.description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

effects.description: Magic resistance: 5% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Melee attack: +4 for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Magic resistance: 10% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Melee attack: +8 for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units
Magic resistance: 15% for Cairn Wraiths and Hexwraiths units

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Weapon strength: +6% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Charge bonus: +9 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Weapon strength: +12% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units
Charge bonus: +12 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs and Terrorgheist units

skillTree.name: Waking Dead
skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Armour: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Armour: +12 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
Melee attack: +8 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units

skillTree.name: Carriages of Death
skillTree.description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Speed: +6% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Melee defence: +6 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Speed: +12% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
Melee defence: +8 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units

skillTree.name: Legions of Dead
skillTree.description: "…and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard and Cairn Wraiths units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Dread Knights
skillTree.description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

effects.description: Ward save: 8% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Deadly Power
skillTree.description: The power of death cannot be denied.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 15% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Flying Horrors
skillTree.description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

effects.description: Missile resistance: +15% for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Dark Retinue
skillTree.description: The Undead whole is always stronger than the sum of its parts.

effects.description: Undying Love: +15 to Melee Attack and Melee Defence when Vlad and Isabella are reinforcing each other
Melee attack: +10 for embedded Vampire Heroes
Melee defence: +10 for embedded Vampire Heroes
